website_summaries.verdict: A great purchase if you're looking for an affordable product with a superb reputation.
pros: Buyers enjoy the satisfying weight and balance of the construction
cons: The handle feels a little uncomfortable to some buyers who claim the steel is sharp in hands

website_summaries.verdict: A top-level carving knife that comes with some great bonus items.
pros: Extremely sharp 9-inch German steel blade with a black Pakka wood handle
Comes with a carving fork, honing rod, and sheath
cons: Some buyers received damaged knives, but the company replaced them

customer_reviews.title: Great knife. Beautiful quality. Super value.
customer_reviews.text: I've been holding off on purchasing a carving set for years. I couldn't justify the expense of a premium set and didn't want to compromise price for quality. I read the reviews and decided to give it a go. I made a bone in prime rib for family and guests on Christmas Eve and I got to use this set for the first time. I AM IMPRESSED !!! I'm always the designated carver at holiday meals and I was proud to show off my new toy! I've already recommended this product to my best friend and fellow foodie Eric. I'll be purchasing more in the future! Thank you, Steve Griffis Landenberg, PA
customer_reviews.author: Monkey Dad.

customer_reviews.title: I Could Have Carved All Night...a life changing knife!
customer_reviews.text: Changing up carving my Thanksgiving turkey I decided to try a good carving knife instead of electric knives. I decided to try a good carving knife. I ve been making roasts and turkeys for 40 years. This carving knife is life changing!!! The ease of cutting is just awesome and crazy!!! My only wish is it lasts in this phenomenal ability to glide!!!
customer_reviews.author: cherina hirsh

customer_reviews.title: If you need a carving set or a gift, this is it.
customer_reviews.text: Solidly built, very sharp. Perfect gift for my brother who has been murdering the turkey with our fathers 50 year old carving set. The knive also has the voids to reduce slices clinging to blade. His wife has jumped whole hog into cooking and smoking meats so this is perfect for turkey, brisket, chicken, and pork.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. McGrath

customer_reviews.title: The Blade and the Handle -awesome
customer_reviews.text: I just love this Knife ! The other Cooks that work with me love it just as much as I do . The knife is well balanced that it fits in your hand ; prep work is a breeze . Buy this knife !
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Great Set
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and the details are very nice. Very sharp out if the box. The fork is also very detailed and high quality. I thought the steel rod would be generic, but it has the same handle material as the knife and fork. I am pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Julian K.

customer_reviews.title: Really nice set
customer_reviews.text: Great knives I bought one to try it and was so surprised at how sharp they really are. They are very well balanced and seem to stay sharp longer than some of the others. I do not put them in dishwasher they are hand washed and wiped down. The only think I need to get used to is that it is a lot heavier than I am used to.
customer_reviews.author: CH

customer_reviews.title: Professional carving at a price you can afford.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected. I needed a carving set for the many dinners we have with friends. My set only comes out when I need it! Awesome set.
customer_reviews.author: vinnie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: beautiful knife & rock solid fork set! completes my full set of matching knives Dalstrong is making a great product here, with a quality that is only surpassed by the quality of service providing the actual product!
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Buy this-you won’t be sorry.
customer_reviews.text: This is the most amazing knife I’ve ever used, and I have some very good knives. I gifted it to family members, then used it to slice the leg of lamb for our dinner-could not believe how sharp it is. Also comes beautifully packaged, and the sharpening rod and fork make this an unbeatable combo.
customer_reviews.author: E. B. Hansen

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING 😉. My husband loved it and also my ...
customer_reviews.text: Just one word: AMAZING 😉. My husband loved it and also my whole family. We are already planing to buy some others from the guide they send us. Pretty elegant the way it is presented and I was really amazed about it. It’s a 10 plus for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Ili-iaN

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought this knife set specifically for Thanksgiving 2017. The knife carved the turkey and ham perfectly. My Dad and brother also tried the knife, and they were impressed with the quality and sharpness. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ROB6192

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: This product came with very strong reviews, backed up by some good specs. It is packaged very nicely, so would make a great gift. I've used it once, and it cuts very nicely. No long term test here, but I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: PAR

customer_reviews.title: Best Carving Set for the Money on Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: This carving set is equal in quality to those costing several times as much. The set is beautiful, and the knife is razor-sharp. If you want an exquisite carving set without breaking the bank, then Dalstrong is the one for you! Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick J. Wood

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: for the money this is a classic set, sharp, attractive , and well balanced .
customer_reviews.author: Jjg147

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Carving Set
customer_reviews.text: This was an impressive gift set. We loved the product quality, steel, packaging all the above. This is very worth buying. We gave it as gifts to our adult children who needed a carving set.
customer_reviews.author: Bobu

customer_reviews.title: Best knife set ever
customer_reviews.text: Packaging is wonderful. Knife and fork work great. Should last a long time. Cuts through meat smoothly with minimal effort. Sharpener and instructions included.
customer_reviews.author: Bulldoglover

customer_reviews.title: Great knife!
customer_reviews.text: Great carving knife, great service. Just found a new favorite knife. Extremely pleased with everything. I'm going to be a repeat customer.
customer_reviews.author: LR

customer_reviews.title: Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered it for the Thanksgiving Turkey! Very impressed with the packaging to start! The knife’s balance and size was perfect. I ordered another as a holiday gift. Looking forward to a lot of carving with this awesome set.
customer_reviews.author: 4SECRETS

customer_reviews.title: Great Carving Set
customer_reviews.text: As described. I purchased this for my husband to replace our electric knife, and he loved it. Carved our Thanksgiving turkey like a pro. I highly recommend this set.
customer_reviews.author: KFabian

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This set is exactly what I was looking. It will slice right through a slab of ribs. I love them!! I will be buying more.

customer_reviews.title: great balance and beauty
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised at the quality of this set, I have paid a great deal more for my Wustof classic knives and the quality is equal. the first thing that I noticed immediately was the beautiful balance that the knife had when I picked it up. When I sliced a prime rib, it was no effort at all. Love the knife and will be ordering more in the future. I highly recommend this company.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher P.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing knife!
customer_reviews.text: Love this knife!! It cuts through meat off the grill in one single slice. It's a beautiful knife and the box to store it in is really nice too. Great set!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: What a fabulous set. Made our Thanksgiving carving a breeze!

customer_reviews.text: beautifully forged and easy to use. Recomend it to anyone. We haven't used it alot so far, it was a Christmas present, but BBQ season is coming and it will be a major tool

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: The set is nice and performs great. You may want a longer knife though. Make sure you are good with this size.

customer_reviews.title: The fabrication and metal in the set was excellent and handled very good
customer_reviews.text: While this was a gift to my granddaughter for Thanksgiving, my husband (who is a welder) looked over the knife set. The fabrication and metal in the set was excellent and handled very good. This should be a great addition to our dinners for a long time.

customer_reviews.title: High quality value
customer_reviews.text: These products are high quality, hold their edge and a great value.

customer_reviews.text: Love this knife! No effort in cutting anything Iv tried so far! Would highly recommend and I do plan on getting more of the dalstrong products

customer_reviews.text: exception product fun to use great customer follow up. already bought more.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful set.
customer_reviews.text: These pieces are beautiful. The knife is very sharp. I look forward to using this set.

customer_reviews.title: I was very impressed with the finish and quality of ...
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with the finish and quality of this knife set. So much so that I just purchased the Dalstrong chefs knife. I’m a culinary student and was going to purchase the Victorinox as my utility work horse, but after seeing the price and quality of the Dalstrong, I’ll be buying more of these for my knife roll.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect carving set
customer_reviews.text: Just what we needed, after losing all our knives and carving forks. Works perfect.

customer_reviews.title: Great looking. Very comfortable in the hand
customer_reviews.text: Great looking. Very comfortable in the hand. My best carving knife by far. Led me to buy the dalstrong 12in slicing knife. Love them both.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They have nice grips and a nice weight to them, my husband loved them!!!

customer_reviews.title: My carving set
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding the fork Is unbelievable the best I have ever seen

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Like the weight
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Like the weight, balance, length & appearance. Very sharp, like having a sheath to protect the knife & nice compartment storage box. Really like the carving fork. The curvature style makes it easier to carve. Definitely recommend .

customer_reviews.title: Sharp high quality
customer_reviews.text: Really sharp. Super high quality blades. Problem is the block is not brown it is a funny red color.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Well packaged, sharp out of the box. Including the steel is a bonus.

customer_reviews.text: I was not expecting it to so exquisite. Came in a beautiful box. Make me carve like a pro. Thank you.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and craftsmanship. The packaging is great too for storage. This is an excellent choice for gifting (Father's Day etc.)!

customer_reviews.title: Does its job perfectly, and in style.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great item! As with every Dalstrong item I have ordered (which is several) it is razor sharp. This set is as beautiful as it is functional. Couldn't ask for more.

customer_reviews.title: 2nd purchase......
customer_reviews.text: Again a well constructed balanced knife. Extremely pleased with the feel and weight. 2nd purchase and l couldn't be happier.

customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a wedding gift and was greatly impressed with the quality of this knife set. Very sharp and well worth the money. One of the best wedding gifts I've ever given!!!!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I had a brisket and it cut like butter. Great blade and fork and great looking as well.

customer_reviews.title: Knife bag needed for the AWSOME knifes you make...
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE ALL THE KNIVES I HAVE GOTTEN .THE 9.5" PROFESSIONAL CHEF KNIFE, THE GLADIATOR 8",THE DALSTRONG CERAMICS KNIFE, THE GLADIATOR SERIES 7" CLEAVER,AND MY NEWBIE THE GLADIATOR SERIES CARVING SET. THE KNIFE COLLECTION IS GROWING AND I'M NOT DONE PURCHASING YOUR PRODUCTS. WOULD REALLY WISH YOU WOULD MAKE A KNIFE BAG. THAT COULD GO WITH THESE BEAUTIFUL KNIVES. THAT'S BIGER THEN THE BIGGEST ONE AMAZON CARRIES." PLEASE MAKE A KNIFE BAG"

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: You would not believe how wafer thin this knife can cut it is the best of the best!

customer_reviews.title: More then our expectations!
customer_reviews.text: The knife set is wonderful gave it as a gift and the guest was so impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Digioia

customer_reviews.title: Terrible and horrible build quality
customer_reviews.text: The handle of the knife feels odd, it doesn't feel like one piece and smooth, it feels with bumps and sharp in some parts. The other problem, the cutting blade of the knife is not sharp at all. And the top of the knife is sharp... What the hell guys... I'm very disappointed because it's the second carving set I bought. The first one was a gift for my friend and he was very happy. And this new set was for me...
customer_reviews.author: Ardilla del mal

customer_reviews.title: Gifted for wedding shower.
customer_reviews.text: Set was purchased as a gift based upon a friend's recommendation.
customer_reviews.author: Linda L. Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Get these knives...NOW!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a sous chef at a local country club. I've always had one special chef knife and used whatever other knives the facility had. For Father's Day this year, my oldest son got me a great knife roll-bag and said I should put my knives in it; but I didn't was to put my home kitchen knives in it. This special bag deserved special knives. After an extensive online search for affordable yet fantastic professional knives, I came across the Dalstrong series. I ordered them, and THEY ARE FANTASTIC! Consistently sharp, beautifully constructed, and well balanced. These knives are THE BOMB! Any chef looking for affordable quality should look no further than Dalstrong!
customer_reviews.author: Robert P. Makuch

customer_reviews.title: I heard the knives where very good so I got them when to use them for ...
customer_reviews.text: I heard the knives where very good so I got them when to use them for the first time sharpen the carbon knife for about 5 to 10 minutes then went out to carve for a wedding and it would even cut the prime rib I do not care for the carving knife I would like to return the kit
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Solid carving knife set - but figured it would be sharper
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully crafted and packaged. Nice thick and heavy fork. It just didn't cut like I thought it would based on reviews. I'm no chef, but I just thought it would slice brisket and prime rib a bit smoother. It was definitely smooth enough to be a valuable carving set. Guess I was just ready to be blown away, but fell short. I'd definitely buy DALSTRONG again because they're so beautifully crafted and you can tell they care about their products. I just know what to expect now.
customer_reviews.author: M. B. Carter

customer_reviews.title: Nice Set
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter for a Christmas gift. Tried it out on the turkey that day and on a ham for New Years. Cuts with ease. Nice weight, and balance and looks great. Daughter is pleased and will enjoy for years to come. Now I want one and its unavailable!
customer_reviews.author: flameonramon

customer_reviews.title: Great Set at an excellant price
customer_reviews.text: A winner. Great gift also. Other Dalstrong reviews of mine will tell you I love their products. Although I am a Shogun series lover, I own some Gladiator series stuff also and find nothing lacking. And this is wonderful combination group, at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Mildred B. Bemis

customer_reviews.title: Love this company
customer_reviews.text: Love the knifes, I have done a lot of research because I wanted a good set of knives that would last for years that didn't empty my bank account. I love the look and feel of these knifes. The customer service has been great as well. I emailed Dalstrong on a Saturday and 4 hours later I had a response!
customer_reviews.author: Thunderbolt

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable well made set. Love it.
customer_reviews.text: For the price you cant beat it. High quality set. Very balanced and comfortable east to use.
customer_reviews.author: Demetrius B.

customer_reviews.title: Good weight and balance yet surprisingly affordable
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a chef by any stretch but this is a quality knife set. Good weight and balance yet surprisingly affordable. It could've been a little sharper out of the box but I see more Dalstrong purchases in my future.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great housewarming gift
customer_reviews.text: Another top shelf top quality knife! Great housewarming gift. Feel confident when you buy Dalstrong Knifes you get Quailty well made blades, lasting Sharpness, and durability.
customer_reviews.author: JAKE

customer_reviews.title: Love these knives however I’m a little surprised that aren’t ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these knives however I’m a little surprised that aren’t as sharp as I’d like. I’m just a home cook so I don’t have a lot of experience with all the different knives available but these won’t disappoint. Be sure to keep them clean!
customer_reviews.author: Sean Richardson

customer_reviews.title: The customer service has been great as well
customer_reviews.text: This set is very well made and balanced. The customer service has been great as well. I have other knives that are more expensive and this set is as good or better than those. good product for a good price!
customer_reviews.author: lakeview

customer_reviews.title: Cuts like butter!
customer_reviews.text: Used the knife and fork to cut a brisket today and it cut through the meat like butter! Now, we'll see how long the blade stays sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew K. Wong

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for my father!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a number of your knives and was so pleased with the quality and value that I ordered the Santoku as a gift for my father, he is so impressed with the quality and value he has thanked me 3 separate times in 1 night!
customer_reviews.author: John R George

customer_reviews.title: As my 2 previous perchases this was a great deal as well
customer_reviews.text: As my 2 previous perchases this was a great deal as well. Not only does dalstrong make good quality steel but it is the way they sharpen their knives. They sharpen them with a greater degree of angle than most which maked a huge difference not only in the smoothness that they cut. But how long that they stay sharp as well. I can't wait till I can get a set of steak knives next. Thanks dalstrong for your Quaility
customer_reviews.author: seth

customer_reviews.title: Great knife!  Replaces electric knife with ease.
customer_reviews.text: We used to use an electric knife, but it seems they are less and less popular. We needed a carving knife so we purchased this one. Packaged nicely and it is a great tool for the kitchen. Slices very nicely. Just what we needed.

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Everything I am looking for in a carving set and more.

customer_reviews.text: For the money, I was very pleased with the product.

customer_reviews.title: this knife is as good if not better in sharpness than both
customer_reviews.text: I have a set of J. Henkel knives including a carving. I also have a Shun carving knife. I have to say, this knife is as good if not better in sharpness than both. I made a briquette just to play with this knife to test it out. Got carried away and didn't think of taking pics. Will post some when I get a chance. Seriously, an amazing knife.

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: This is the 4th knife I have bought and I'm so happy with all my purchases. I would recommend anyone looking for a great knife at a reasonable price to try dalstrong and the customer service will bend over backwards to keep their customers happy.
customer_reviews.author: Jbird

product_meta.title: DALSTRONG Carving Knife & Fork Set - Gladiator Series - German HC Steel - 4pc Hollow Ground - Honing Rod - 9"
feature_bullets: The Final Word in Carving Sets : Ensure every roast, every turkey and every ham is perfectly sliced, with effortless motion and seamless maneuverability .Outstanding Dalstrong craftsmanship, cutting-edge technology, stunning design elements, and premium materials.

Incredibly razor sharp, full-tang, imported high-carbon German steel with a hand polished edge at 14-16 degrees per side. Precisely tempered and stain resistant. Beautiful pakkawood carving fork with Dalstrong rivet, honing rod and sheath.

Award winning design, with satisfying heft, premium materials and quality feel. Luxury imported black pakkawood handle is triple-riveted with a grip that ensures comfort and maneuverability. Laminated and polished for a sanitary build.

Engineered to perfection at 56+ Rockwell hardness and hand polished to a satin finish. Carefully tapered for improved hardness, flexibility, and minimal slicing resistance. Included honing rod ensures your blade is forever in peak performance, right when you need it.
See why thousands of professional chefs and home cooks love and trust the DALSTRONG DIFFERENCE. 100% SATISFACTION OR MONEY BACK GUARANTEE, try it risk free, we know you'll love it!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars183 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
